prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon inspired by insects with a large, intimidating body and powerful pincers.
I want to design a Pokemon that embodies agility and strength, with vibrant orange and white colors.
Generate a creature that resembles an insect, featuring sharp claws and a unique body shape.
Make a Pokemon that is known for its fierce fighting style, showcasing bright colors and strong features.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in forest habitats, with distinct physical traits and a captivating appearance.
Show me an insectoid Pokemon with a blend of orange and white, featuring large claws and a strong stance.
Give me a visual of a bug-type Pokemon that showcases its power through its stance and colors.
